subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: A day after his 3-hour-48-minute second-round thriller, Andre Agassi was far too sore to practice and was administered an anti-inflammatory injection to deal with his back pain.
snippet: A day after his 3-hour-48-minute second-round thriller, Andre Agassi was far too sore to practice and was administered an anti-inflammatory injection to deal with his back pain.
